Detailed Description

DTS Console Interface.

DTSCONSOLE.C

DTS Console Interface - These are the methods implemented for he XML-RPC interace. These command are used from a variety of locations during the operation of the DTS (i.e. the queueing, logging or interactive environments.

monAttach - attach logging to the specified dtsmonitor

Author:
Mike Fitzpatrick, NOAO
Date:
6/15/09
